    https://github.com/Stupremee

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Mono<User> edit​(Consumer<? super UserEditSpec> spec)
      Requests to edit the current user that is logged in.
      Mono<ApplicationInfo> getApplicationInfo()
      Requests to retrieve the application info.
      double getAveragePing()
      Calculates the average of the amount of time it last took Discord Gateway to respond to a heartbeat with an ack from all shards that are connected.

      Tries to retrieve a Channel and returns it in a Mono.

      Returns all guilds of all shards in a Flux.

      Tries to retrieve a Member from his id and his guildId.

      Returns all users from all shards in a Flux.

      Logs in all shards and set the default presences.

      Tries to find the shard with the given id and starts it.

      Logs out all shards.

      Tries to find the shard with the given id and stops it.

      Restarts the shard with the given id.

                              Snowflake id)
        Tries to retrieve a GuildEmoji by the id.
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the emote
        Returns:
        A Mono where, upon successful completion, emits the * application info. If an error is received, it is emitted through the Mono.

      • edit

        @Nonnull
Mono<User> edit​(@Nonnull
                Consumer<? super UserEditSpec> spec)
        Requests to edit the current user that is logged in.
        Parameters:
        spec - A Consumer that provides a "blank" UserEditSpec to be operated on.
        Returns:
        A Mono where, upon successful completion, emits the edited User. If an error is received, * it is emitted through the Mono.

      • getApplicationInfo

        @Nonnull
Mono<ApplicationInfo> getApplicationInfo()
        Requests to retrieve the application info.
        Returns:
        A Mono where, upon successful completion, emits the application info. If an error is received, it is emitted through the Mono.

      • getAveragePing

        double getAveragePing()
        Calculates the average of the amount of time it last took Discord Gateway to respond to a heartbeat with an ack from all shards that are connected.

      • getShardById

        @Nonnull
Optional<DiscordClient> getShardById​(@Nonnegative
                                     int id)
        Returns the shard in an Optional with the given id.
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the shard
        Returns:
        A Optional that contains the shard or is empty if the shard with this id doesn't exists
